rooms.description: Wide and inviting entrance hall with a decorative foyer. Vastu compliant entry facing the east or north.
Spacious living area with natural light, central location for joint family gatherings. Aligned per Vastu to harness positive energy.
Open plan dining area integrated with the kitchen, designed for communal meals. South or east facing window to capture sunlight.
Modern modular kitchen with sufficient counter space and ventilation. Placed in a favorable Vastu direction (north-west) if possible, ensuring efficient workflow.
Three large bedrooms designed for privacy and comfort, each with adjacent wardrobes and built-in storage. Bedrooms positioned in the north-east or west to ensure calm energies as per Vastu.
Separate bathroom facilities attached to master bedroom ensuring privacy, with south facing windows to benefit from natural lighting while maintaining seclusion.
Dedicated workspace designed for work-from-home needs. Quiet area with proper ventilation and east or north facing window to harness positive energy, aligned with Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Two-car garage integrated with the ground floor plan. Positioned in the southwest or west side of the building to facilitate smooth vehicular access and maintain Vastu balance.
Covered porch at the entrance, promoting a transitional space between exterior and interior, ensuring a welcoming energy flow as per Vastu.
